itunes:title: Wish We Would've Known THIS BEFORE...
title: Wish We Would've Known THIS BEFORE...
description:
Some lessons come hard earned and learned. Here are a few of our most critical "wish we would've known" lessons we've learned as homemakers over the years.

BIG THANKS to our sponsor American Blossom Linens. Turn your bedroom into an organic, chic oasis by using the promo code HOMEMAKERCHIC20, and get an exclusive 20% off discount just for listening to the show.

What's We're Sipping
www.dryfarmwines.com/homemakerchic
The “What We’re Sipping” segment today is brought to you by Dry Farm Wines. Dry Farms is a wine supplier that pairs organic, biodynamic, low-sugar, low-alcohol wines from all over the world with customers that share their love for organic, naturally and traditionally made wines. We love them because their wine is delicious, unfussy, and oh-so-good.
